channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says he’s firing Fed governor Lisa Cook, she vows she ‘will not resign’
item.description: Trump's move is likely to touch off an extensive legal battle that will probably go to the Supreme Court and could disrupt financial markets.

item.title: Slashing the Intelligence Office Workforce Is Just a Start
item.description: Creating the Office of the Director of National Intelligence was a mistake. Short of its being erased, it needs to be streamlined and reformed.
